title: Stuzzicheria Romagnola
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small typical place, with a cool atmosphere, offers classic piadina romagnola, including a good choice of vegan piadina and made-in-house vegan cookies. Dog friendly. The owner is vegetarian and the three girls are vegan. The vegan/vegetarian menu has over 25 choices for vegans including salads, fried potatoes and 15 varieties of cookies. Covered seating for 40, plus take-away is available.
